channel.title: Aid Transparency Index technical consultation – closes 14 April!
channel.description:
The [technical consultation](https://github.com/pwyf/2017-technical-consultation#2017-technical-consultation-for-the-aid-transparency-index) for the next [Aid Transparency Index](http://www.publishwhatyoufund.org/the-index/) closes on the 14 April (this week!)
If you haven’t already, please add your comments on the proposed tests here: https://github.com/pwyf/2017-technical-consultation#2017-technical-consultation-for-the-aid-transparency-index
Thank you!

item.title: Aid Transparency Index technical consultation – closes 14 April!
item.dc:creator: andylolz
item.description:
The technical consultation for the next Aid Transparency Index closes on the 14 April (this week!)

If you haven’t already, please add your comments on the proposed tests here:

GitHub

pwyf/2018-index-indicator-definitions

Contribute to pwyf/2018-index-indicator-definitions development by creating an account on GitHub.

Thank you!

Read full topic
item.source: Aid Transparency Index technical consultation – closes 14 April!
